com.chunkr.compress.chunkers

Class ModifiedChunker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chunkr.compress.Chunker
      • com.chunkr.compress.chunkers.ModifiedChunker

  • public class ModifiedChunker
extends Chunker
    Implementation of the special "modified" chunking algorithm. The modified chunking exploits the locality of bits to recover original unchunked data even if the chunked values are altered slightly.
    Author:
    ashwin
    See Also:
    Chunker

      Constructs a new ModifiedChunker using the default bit weightings.

      Constructs a new ModifiedChunker using the specified weights.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModifiedChunker

        public ModifiedChunker(int chunkSize)
        Constructs a new ModifiedChunker using the default bit weightings. By default, the bit weights are uniform; therefore, the most significant bit will have the same weight as the least significant bit.
        Parameters:
        chunkSize - size of chunks

      • ModifiedChunker

        public ModifiedChunker(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> weights)
        Constructs a new ModifiedChunker using the specified weights. This enables us to determine the optimal set of bit weights to recover as much of the original data as possible.
        Parameters:
        weights - bit weights
